title: Centre didn’t ask before hiking fuel prices; why exhort states to cut VAT now, asks TN finance minister - India Today
content: Centre didn’t ask before hiking fuel prices; why exhort states to cut VAT now, asks TN finance minister  India Today
description: Tamil Nadu's finance minister criticised the excise duty cut announcement. He said that the centre did not ask states before hiking fuel prices, then why exhort them now to cut VAT.
